title: Neymar scores superb free-kick as PSG see off Lille
description: Neymar showed his set-piece prowess once again as PSG romped to a 3-0 win at Lille in Ligue 1 on Saturday night.
content:
The Brazil international was on target with a delightful free-kick as the Ligue 1 leaders cruised to their 20th win of the season.
The men from the French capital are now 11 points clear of Marseille and Neymar has played a full part since making his world-record move from Barcelona last summer.
Saturday night's goal was an 18th of the season for the forward, and it made the scoreline 2-0 to the visitors after Yuri Berchice had put them in front.
Giovani Lo Celso added a third late on as PSG continue to look strong ahead of their Champions League tie with Real Madrid, which kicks off on February 14.
They were beaten 2-1 by Lyon last month but have bounced back with three straight wins, scoring 11 goals in the process.
Click on the video link above to watch Neymar add another great goal to his impressive CV!
